channel.title: Jimmy Song on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Jimmy Song on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Jimmy Song - Taproot multisig (2022-03-03)
item.description: Name: Jimmy Song Topic: Taproot multisig Location: Advancing Bitcoin Date: March 3rd 2022 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uo3uzofPlX0 Slides: https://jimmysong.github.io/taproot-multisig Pull request adding multisig Taproot support to buidl-python: https://github.com/buidl-bitcoin/buidl-python/pull/109 Intro (Jeff Gallas) The next speaker is Jimmy Song who doesn’t really need an introduction but in any case, he has been, which is important for this conference, running the Programming Blockchain workshops for 5 years now. Leon is one of his alumni so there is a direct connection to this conference.
